description: The Sazanami Japanese Maple is a stunning cultivar with remarkable foliage. Its leaves have a beautiful reddish purple color with deep-toothed lobes, while its branchlets have a unique delicately wavy form. During autumn, the leaves turn an impressive yellow-red color. This feature gives the tree an interesting and attractive look throughout the year. The maple is also easy to maintain and can adapt to a variety of soil types and conditions. With its moderate growth rate and beautiful colors, the Sazanami Japanese Maple is a captivating addition to any garden or landscape.
